task_body_text:
Welcome to the first of three word searches.

On the next screen you will see a grid of letters. Within that grid, there are 16 hidden words. Words can go left-to-right, up-to-down, and diagonally, they may also share letters with another word. When you find an word, use your mouse to click and drag across the corresponding letters (a yellow block-line will appear where you drag). If you correctly identify a hidden word, the block-line will turn green and remain in place

You have 5 minutes to find as many words as you can. A sliding timer bar below the grid indicates how long you have left. If you find all the words before the time is up, the task will automatically end.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!

Please note: none of the 16 words are less than 4 letters. The letter grid is dynamically created when the task starts, however, and this may result in some additional words, outside the required 16 being generated too. Finally, please be aware, no data regarding how many words you find is being recorded.

I hope you enjoyed the last word search, here is another.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!

Please note: none of the 16 words are less than 4 letters. The letter grid is dynamically created when the task starts, however, and this may result in some additional words, outside the required 16 being generated too. Finally, please be aware, no data regarding how many words you find is being recorded.

I hope you enjoyed the last two word searches, here is the final puzzle.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!

Please note: none of the 16 words are less than 4 letters. The letter grid is dynamically created when the task starts, however, and this may result in some additional words, outside the required 16 being generated too. Finally, please be aware, no data regarding how many words you find is being recorded.

Congratulations on getting through all three word searches. Since It's Christmas, I thought you deserve a present for your endeavour. So, click the button below to see what Santa has delivered. Ho ho ho.

Merry Christmas
